channel.title: Teachings on Computational Quantum Science
channel.description: Recent content in Teachings on Computational Quantum Science

item.title: Lab course: Computational physics
item.description: This winter term (2022/23) we are launching this new branch of the Practical Course M at the University of Cologne. All information about the course can be found here.

item.title: Tutorial: Programmiertutorial für Computerphysik
item.description: As part of the lecture “Computational physics” we are teaching programming in Julia. Materials Jupyter notebooks for the tutorial are available on GitHub.

item.title: Tutorial: Programmiertutorial für Computerphysik
item.description: As part of the lecture “Computational physics” we are teaching programming in Julia. Materials Tutorial videos available on Vimeo. Jupyter notebooks for the tutorial are available on GitHub.
